resources.string: 💪🏽 Find out how strong your friendship 🤝 really is by answering my questions 🧐 at www.example.com 🌐 or using my invitation code 🔑 to join the fun 🎉.
🔗 Your quiz link will be created.
📩 Send the link to your friends.
🏃‍️ Come back to see their results.
Here is the quiz created by ****. Accept the challenge and answer questions to find out how well you really know your friend!

Make a quiz for friends to check how well they know you!🤔 Create quiz questions about yourself💭. You can use our examples or write your own questions and answers📝. Don\'t think too long about which answer to choose🤯. Just select the one that seems to describe you most accurately🤔. Be honest👍🏼!

After answering all the questions you\'ll get a link to your friendship quiz. Share it with your friends on Whatsapp, Messenger or via email to check how well your friends really know you 😉! Who\'s ready to take up the challenge and who will get the highest score?

It\'s supposed to be fun 😄! Don\'t take the results too seriously 😵! If your friends score a low number of points 💯 it doesn\'t mean that your bond is weak 😕. It might mean that your questions were really tricky or still there is a lot to find out about each other and strengthen your friendship!
